I got Heritrix compiled with Maven and now the crawler is running too.
Than=
ks for your help.

I also imported Heritrix into Eclipse. It=E2=80=99 a gre=
at visual way
to see structure of the whole software. (Although I don=E2=80=
=99t think
it=E2=80=99s a good idea to try compile or run Heritrix from Ecl=
ipse.
Now for example it reports an error on every =E2=80=98assert=E2=80=99=

statement in the code.) Maybe one should just edit the source in
Eclipse a=
nd compile it with Maven.
